tournament.name: Killer Queen and Close Friends (KQCF)
tournament.description:
An event run by the Baltimore KQ community;
Over a dozen local volunteers!
1-2 KQ cabs, stay on site, play all night. 2nd cab for 8+ teams
Like a smaller version of KQAF but with a bonfire and a hot tub. 
Dine on the finest BBQ, grilled cheese, pancakes, and french toast in all the land.

BYOT Saturday with groups and DE, 
Draft/PPP Sunday if there's interest.

As much trash as you can handle, but leave no trace. 

Tabletop Games, Pool Table, Bonfire, Hot Tub, Silent Disco

We can host about 15 people on site comfortably. 20+ if we snuggle.

This is taking place at a private residence and we are holding all attendees to the highest standard of excellent behavior. You will be asked to leave if you violate the Baltimore code of conduct. https://docs.google.com/document/d/1NlHYTVz92duf0EJhHbiTthEy4Uxl6okzzBqJABBaL8I/
tournament.registration_message:
BYOT Saturday with groups and DE, Draft/PPP Sunday
As much trash as you can handle, but leave no trace. 
Tabletop Games, Pool Table, Bonfire, Hot Tub, Silent Disco

We'll have 2 cabs if we have 8 or more teams.
We'll be cooking up some BBQ, grilled cheese and French toast and would love to see you there! 
We can host about 15 people on site comfortably. 
20+ if we snuggle.

This is taking place at a private residence and we are holding all attendees to the highest standard of excellent behavior. You will be asked to leave if you violate the Baltimore code of conduct.
tournament.payment_message: We'll be spending money on food, transport, maintenance, and supplies. If you feel so inclined, consider chipping in extra or bring something to share/grill/fry. Not required but the more we have the more we can share.
